name: csv_by_rfc
description: CSV according to RFC 4180.  Everyone else's are weirdly wrong.  Heavily tested; typed in typescript

scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && rimraf -f dist && rimraf -f docs && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir esm && mkdir cjs && cd .. && mkdir docs
scripts.test: npm run unit && npm run stoch
scripts.changelog: rm -f CHANGELOG.* && rm -f ./src/doc_md/CHANGELOG.* && better_git_changelog -b && cp CHANGELOG.* ./src/doc_md/
scripts.doc: typedoc --out docs/docs/ src/ts/index.ts && cp src/misc/.nojekyll docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run typescript && npm run rollup && npm run changelog && npm run doc

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
